adjectives.description: observant (comparative more observant, superlative most observant)

entries.meaning: Alert and paying close attention; watchful.
examples: The observant police officer noticed that my tax disk was out-of-date.

entries.meaning: Diligently attentive in observing a law, custom, duty or principle; regardful; mindful.
examples: I was normally observant of the local parking restrictions.
